review: Google Chomecast is fantastic. I take it along on business trips and watch streaming video content from Amazon's video library, and Netflix's video library.
author: Zachary

review: I have the Google Chromecast in my kids’ playroom.  I like the fact that I can choose and play a Netflix movie from anywhere in the house, that it doesn’t tie my phone to the TV and that I can use almost any mobile device (Tablet, laptop, chromebook, ipod, smartphone, etc…) to choose a movie.  The only downfall is that if I forget to play a movie, the Chromecast home screen creates screen burning.  It already happened on my LED tv.
